Fabio Cesar Diehl

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/2805777298828951
  • Última atualização do currículo em 21/05/2019

- Consultant at Petrobras in offshore oil and gas process simulation and control since 2018 - Process Engineer at Petrobras since 2010 - Master in process control topics (2009) by Federal University of Rio Grande do Sul (UFRGS) - Graduated in Chemical Engineering (2006) by Caxias do Sul University (UCS) - Engages in research, development and innovation at CENPES (Research and Deveplment Center of Petrobras) in offshore oil and gas production (Texto informado pelo autor)
